targets.query: SELECT count("value") FROM "temperature" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT count("value") FROM "temperature" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT count("temperature") FROM "ruuvi_measurements" WHERE ("name" = 'Sauna') AND ("temperature") > 50 AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(18h))
SELECT max("temperature") FROM "ruuvi_measurements" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(24h)
SELECT mean("temperature") FROM "ruuvi_measurements" WHERE ("name" = 'Eteinen') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("airDensity") FROM "ruuvi_measurements" WHERE ("name" = 'Eteinen') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("temperature") FROM "ruuvi_measurements" WHERE ("name" = 'Terassi') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(none)

panels.description: One measurement is one "packet" of data sent by a RuuviTag, which includes all sensor readings.

targets.query: SELECT count("temperature") FROM "ruuvi_measurements" where time > now() - 1h
SELECT count("temperature") FROM "ruuvi_measurements" where time > now() - 1m

panels.title: Tilastot datasta

panels.description: Measurements collected per wallclock-hour, thus the current hour shows incorrectly because part of it is in the future :)
panels.title: Mittauksia tunnissa
